alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:53AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pine and west central Burnett Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 153 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brook Park, or 8 miles west of Hinckley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hinckley around 215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Grindstone Lake Pine County, Saint Croix State Park, Cloverdale, Friesland, Beroun, Phantom Lake, Chengwatana State Forest and Banning State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
